GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of ALL users

GET /api/users/username.description: returns an array of ALL usernames

GET /api/users/:username/:data.description: returns a specific piece of information from the user object

GET /api/users/:username/:count.description: returns a count of an array on the user object

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of ALL topics

GET /api/topics/slug.description: returns an array of ALL topic slugs

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of ALL articles

GET /api/articles/article_id.description: returns an array of ALL article_id's with their corresponding titles

exampleResponse.article_title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article by its id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_title NOT IMP.description: serves an article by its title

GET /api/articles/:username.description: gets all articles by a specific user

GET /api/articles/:slug.description: gets all articles by a specific topic

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: replaces the specific article with an updated article object

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id/:data.description: replaces the specific article data with updated input data

GET /api/comments/comment_id.description: returns an array containing ALL comment_id's with their corresponding article_id

exampleResponse.article_id: Living in the shadow of a great man
Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/comments/:article_id.description: get all comments by a specific article

GET /api/comments/:username.description: gets all comments by a specific user
